title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Circular Haaram

The design is inspired by traditional South Indian floral patterns (Puja) but updated for a modern aesthetic. The CZ diamonds are pav√© set for maximum sparkle. Features slight ruby (Red) accent.

description: This Vaishnavi Haaram combines the timeless allure of emeralds and diamonds with a modern, wearable design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. The circular design is symbolic of eternity and wholeness, making it a meaningful gift for loved ones.
